displayName: Lupus Village, House of Warrior Acro

parameters: Bride Dakuri: I wonder if that person is okay...

Bride Dakuri: Did you come from the Magic Academy by any
chance!?

Mage Relm: This great genius has arrived! Please rest
assured, I will definitely solve the problem!

Bride Dakuri: Ah... I'm glad... that person disappeared...
I felt lonely... and anxious...

Mage Relm: Did you notice anything strange before their
disappearance?

Bride Dakuri: She suddenly started having tantrums... Even
though she's usually a kind person, I can't believe it.

Mage Relm: This is one of the typical symptoms. I believe
she is definitely a victim of Lupido's Tears.

Thief Nora: Um, can anyone get their hands on Lupido's
Tears?

Mage Relm: It's a story from over 150 years ago, so only a
true collector would have it.
Mage Relm: There's something I want to ask you.
Mage Relm: Are you hiding something from us?

Bride Dakuri: N-No, I didn't mean to hide it! The truth is,
my husband Acro used to be a warrior of the former Aspida
Alliance.

Thief Nora: They're a group that collects crystals and
legendary weapons, right?

Bride Dakuri: He got tired of the rough way of doing things
and left. Please, please, help Acro...

Mage Relm: I'm just here to fulfill the request. Do you
have any idea where Acro might have gone?

Bride Dakuri: I think it's the hideout of the Aspida
Alliance...
Bride Dakuri: Please take care of him.

Bride Dakuri: Acro...!? Ah, I'm relieved... I'm glad you're
safe...
Warrior Acro: Thank you all so much.

Mage Relm: It's only natural for us to do that. If you ever
have any troubles, please rely on the Academy!

Warrior Acro: As for the reward, please take this. I hope
it can be of some help on your adventurous journey,
everyone.
Mage Relm: Please make sure... to live happily, okay?

Warrior Acro: I received this life thanks to all of you. I
will use it to protect Dakuri.
Bride Dakuri: Hehe, that's so embarrassing.
Bride Dakuri: Thank you so much.

Warrior Acro: It's a life that I owe to all of you. I will
use it to protect Dakuri.

Warrior Acro: It's a life that I owe to all of you. I will
use it to protect Dakuri.
